# **Get your FLEX on, with our new NVME KVM Flex VPS Plan**

<br />

> ## 40% off NVMe KVM Flex VPS (recurring discount - applies to all billing cycles)

> ***Promo code:*** *FLEXHARD* ***Valid thru:*** *Friday, February 12th, 2021* <br />


> **[NVMe KVM Flex](https://clik.rip/NVMeFlex)**

> NVMe Storage: 5GB-2TB
> vCPU: 1-48
> Memory: 512MB-64GB
> Transfer: 1TB-50TB
> Port Speed: 1Gbps-10Gbps
> Location: Phoenix, AZ
> Monthly: ~~$7/mo~~ $4.20/mo
> Quarterly: ~~$19.93/qtr~~ $11.96/qtr
> Semi-annual: ~~$37.85/6mo~~ $22.71/qtr
> Annual: ~~$70/yr~~ $42/yr

Order Here: https://clik.rip/NVMeFlex

>**Included with all NVMe plans:**
>* RAID-10 NVMe solid-state storage
>* 1 Gbps uplink (up to 10 Gbps)
>* Full hardware virtualization (KVM)
>* Dedicated IPv4 (Up to 8 IPs)
>* IPv6 /64 subnet
>* Instantly deployed
>* Custom OS installs
>* OS re-installs
>* Upgrade at any time
>* Daily automated disaster recovery backups

<br />
>  **Terms and Conditions** Offers valid through Friday, February 12th, 2021. Offer void if similar package is cancelled within 45 days.
